author: Bradley Burston
title: The five top Jewish leaders more concerned with threats to Trump than to U.S. Jews - Opinion - Israel News | Haaretz.com
text: > Opinion Opinion The Five Top Jewish Leaders More Concerned With Threats to Trump Than to U.S. Jews I've got news for Bibi. The six million Jews of America are under threat. When Israel can't be bothered to support them at a time like this, no one should recognize Israel as a Jewish state.
